main

(thermal_history.thermal_history.stable_layer_models.FeS_conducting.main)

conducting_FeS(model)[source]

Simple model taking the temperature of the FeS layer to be uniform.

Parameters:

model (ThermalModel) – Main model class

evolve(model)[source]

Evolve the stable layer, taking into account the presence of a liquid FeS layer. Changes from leeds_thermal.main.evolve are commented by #!#

Parameters:

model (ThermalModel) – Main model class
